name: Primet Ltd
goal:
The principal activity of the company is to be the main federal trade organisation open to all companies with an operational base in Europe within the private sector of the economy that provides value added meteorological and climatological services to end users or distributors. PRIMET seeks to pursue actions that it believes will result in economic growth and facilitate competition on equal commercial terms within the data supply chain (particularly in respect of Public Sector Information) for all those operating in its membersâ€™ market of interest.

The company is run on a not-for-profit basis.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Single market
euInitiatives:
The PSI Directive
The Inspire Directive
Any initiatives, policies and legislative files relating to Climate Change
